titles.title: Fierce Was The Wild Billow (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fierce was the wild billow Dark was the night Oars laboured heavily Foam glimmered white Trembled the mariners Peril was nigh Then said the God of God Peace it is I{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ridge of the mountain-wave Lower thy crest Wail of the hurricane Be thou at rest Sorrow can never be Darkness must fly Where saith the Light of Light Peace it is I{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Deliverer Nigh to us be Soothe thou my voyaging Over Life's sea Thou when the storm of death Roars sweeping by Whisper O Truth of Truth Peace it is I{/lang-eng}
